import{GraphQLError}from"../../error/GraphQLError.mjs";/**
 * Unique variable names
 *
 * A GraphQL operation is only valid if all its variables are uniquely named.
 */export function UniqueVariableNamesRule(context){var knownVariableNames=Object.create(null);return{OperationDefinition:function OperationDefinition(){knownVariableNames=Object.create(null);},VariableDefinition:function VariableDefinition(node){var variableName=node.variable.name.value;if(knownVariableNames[variableName]){context.reportError(new GraphQLError("There can be only one variable named \"$".concat(variableName,"\"."),[knownVariableNames[variableName],node.variable.name]));}else{knownVariableNames[variableName]=node.variable.name;}}};}
